Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content: We show how to place the Facebook "Like Button" as script in the demo article content and give a formatter that renders the script - but only if the content is not edited or moved, in such a case a reload is necessary.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: You need to add a script of a foreign provider, e.g., a Facebook Like-button? - Here's how to do it right.
